welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hoyo de Manzanares, a charming town nestled in the beautiful Sierra de Guadarrama mountains. Known for its breathtaking views and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our city's unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal primarily used for international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most technologically advanced terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: An extension of Terminal 4, mainly used for long-haul and premium international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
